common_issues.title: PiecesOS launch and functionality issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with PiecesOS launching and specific features like "Share Link" not working properly. Troubleshooting has involved checking for duplicate installations and requesting user logs for further analysis. Solutions are pending further investigation and may involve addressing software conflicts or bugs.

related_issues.title: PiecesOS was unable to launch
related_issues.text:
PiecesOS was unable to launch
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.2.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Ensure core Dependencies ... (retry setup)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8b426c73-aebb-4905-857f-bdee4cad2882)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points:**

* User (@MR-AAYU) reported "PiecesOS was unable to launch" error.
* User provided log files.
* Problem identified: Pieces for Developers installed twice on the system.
* Solution proposed:
    * Identify and remove duplicate installation.
    * Provide logs from the correct location.

**Current Status:**

* User has provided logs from incorrect location.
* Issue not yet resolved.

**Next Steps:**

* User needs to provide logs from correct location.
* Support team will further investigate and propose solutions.

related_issues.title: Shareable link is not generating
related_issues.text:
Shareable link is not generating
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.1.2

### Early Access Program

- [x] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/907584e3-3310-4866-bd26-5fbf6e371d62)
Shareable link is not generating . 
## GitHub Issue Summary: Share Link Functionality Not Working

**Key Points:**

* User (@19richa) reported an issue with the "Share Link" functionality.
* The issue was automatically routed to the Pieces support team.
* The bot suggested some related issues and resources.
* A support representative (@mark-at-pieces) requested the user's email address for further investigation.

**Problems Identified:**

* The "Share Link" functionality was not working.
* The specific details of the issue were not provided by the user.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The support representative requested more information from the user.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is still under investigation.

**Additional Notes:**

* The issue conversation is from February 27, 2025.
* The user's name is not provided in the conversation.
* The email address of the support representative is not provided.

recommendations: Investigate and address the root cause of the "PiecesOS launch and functionality issues" as it has affected multiple users and is causing frustration. This should be a top priority.
Provide clearer instructions or documentation on how to locate and submit logs, as misinterpretation led to delays in resolving issue #633.

Gather more details from the user in issue #643 regarding the "Shareable link is not generating" problem to understand the specific context and replicate the issue. This will help in faster resolution.

Given the early stage of reported issues, proactively monitor new tickets for similar trends related to PiecesOS launch or feature functionalities. This will help identify if it's a wider systemic issue requiring immediate attention.

Consider creating a dedicated troubleshooting guide or FAQ section for common PiecesOS issues like launch problems and "Share Link" errors. This will empower users to self-serve and potentially reduce ticket inflow.
